Posts.Content: Hi everyone! Can we stop talking about death and think about living? Yes, I know it's something to think about and that it'll happen sooner or later but better later. Now let's get on with each new day so we can be ready when God calls us to Him. Let's think about this day, Valentine's Day. I wish all of you lots of love, a long life to live and love and may you always be loved. Always. In this world and in the next. Hugs, Marie
Posts.Title: Happy Valentine's Day!

Posts.Content: Hi, there's a lady on the chat board who's husband has tried the gamma knife and so far so good. I don't know much about it but I hope she sees your message and answers you. Good luck.
Posts.Title: gamma knife

Posts.Content: Hi Jean, yes I like Celebrex but like vioxx better. I used to take the first but now since my arthritis in my neck, I take vioxx and it's great. Good to the stomach too. Boy, by the looks of it, we're all in some kind of pain!!! God help us all. I also take celebrex when I have a headache etc. I have chronic gastritis so I have to be careful. Hugs and love to all, Marie
Posts.Title: St. John's Wort and Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: jean, celebrex isn't an anti-depressive. I take it for pain. Unless you know something I don't know or I'm mixed up about. But I'm almost sure that celebrex is for pain. I can't tolerate zoloft either and want to try St. John's Wort too. My onc said I could but it's mild not strong as zoloft. I'll let you know how it goes. Marie
Posts.Title: St. John's Wort and Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi, I agree with all those who posted you about taking tamoxifen to fight your cancer but I also suggest that you ask about Arimidex. I take it and don't have any problems with it. Suppose to be better too. Hugs, Marie
Posts.Title: risk of not taking tamoxifin?

Posts.Content: Hi Cathy, glad to hear your good news. Keep up the good work! Always believe in the power of prayer. Hugs, Marie
Posts.Title: Some Good News to Report

Posts.Content: Ida, you're not selfish and he should understand or try to a little bit more. Go and enjoy yourself! Hugs, Marie
Posts.Title: Need some opinions

Posts.Content: Hi Jenn, welcome back and congrats on all your good news. Best of luck to you and visit us sometimes. OUr prayers are always with you too. Hugs, Marie
Posts.Title: I'm Back!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Posts.Content: Hi ladies, guess who is part of our "club"? My favorite singer, Anastacia. She has BC at an early stage. Instead of people joining her fan club, she's part of ours now. Sad to say but this cancer doesn't look anyone in the face. I hope she'll be alright. God help us all. My thoughts and prayers are always with all of you. Hugs, Marie
Posts.Title: guess who

Posts.Content: Prayers on the way! We're all with you. Everything is going to be all right if you believe it will. Hugs, Marie
Posts.Title: Some prayers are needed today

Posts.Content: Such great news maggs. So happy for you. In fact, I was wondering how you were since I don't see you post too often. Hope all is well. Hugs, Marie
Posts.Title: Great News from Maryland
